data.title: Thunderbirds Hockey Club
data.meta_description: SISU Thunderbirds Hockey Club travel tryout registration for the following age groups is now open: 10U, 12U, 14U, 16U & 18U. The tryout fee is $100 and includes 2-3 ice sessions. All sessions will be held at Chiller North.
data.text:
SISU Thunderbirds Hockey Club will offer full-season TierII program that includes teams at the 12U, 14U, 16U & 18U.We pride ourselves in being a successful and growing pioneer in hockey activities that inspire character, leadership, development and enable successful experiences. Preparing players for the next level of hockey, including: travel, high school, junior, college and beyond. Our goal is to bring these elite players together and challenge them with top training, develop their skills, expose them to top competition, and continually stress the importance of their academics, so they will have the best opportunity to advance to the next levels both as a student and athlete.

Tryouts will take place April 22-26.

Once our rosters have been finalized the teams will begin practice in August. The regular season will conclude in March with the State tournament.

SISU Thunderbirds teams that win a State Championship would advance to Tier II Nationals extending the season into the first week of April.

The number of competitive games and amount of travel will be determined by each coach, as a general rule, a parent can expect 40 to 65 games of league play, tournaments and non-league games over a seven-month season. U16 and U18 can expect to play a NAPHL schedule.

Teams typically schedule four to seven tournaments a season.

Players who make the travel team must purchase team jerseys and socks. You will also have to purchase a team bag, white helmet, gloves that coordinate team colors, pant shells, jersey garment bag, and warm ups.

These costs are not included in the team fees and must be paid by each family upon ordering. Ordering is done with in the first few weeks after tryouts.
